title: Sticky orange potato cake
ingredients: ['350g Maris Piper potatoes, peeled and quartered', '200g butter, softened', '155g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 large eggs', '175g ground almonds', '2 tablespoons baking powder', 'finely grated zest and juice of 2 oranges', 'finely grated zest of 1 lemon', '3 tablespoons granulated sugar']
